layout.grid_system: Flexbox Centered (h-screen w-full flex items-center justify-center)

AvatarBubble.description: Circular or Heart-shaped containers representing Naman and Sumedha
AvatarBubble.style: w-24 h-24 md:w-32 md:h-32 rounded-full bg-white shadow-xl flex items-center justify-center border-4 border-rose-200 z-10
AvatarBubble.motion: Float animation (y-axis bobbing) in initial state

HugButton.style: px-8 py-4 bg-rose-600 text-white rounded-full font-bold text-xl shadow-lg hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-rose-300/50 transition-all

states.initial: Two avatars separated by distance (one left, one right).
states.animate: Avatars move to center (x: 0), scale up slightly, and merge/bounce.
states.celebration: Explosion of heart particles (canvas or framer-motion layoutId)

images.strategy: Use abstract representation (Initials/Memojis) or Lucide Icons if no custom photos provided. If photos available, place inside AvatarBubble.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup: Install 'framer-motion' and 'lucide-react' if not present.
4. Initial State: Render two motion.divs (Naman left, Sumedha right). Render a CTA button in the center.
5. Interaction: On click, set 'isHugged' to true.
6. Animated State: The two motion.divs animate to x=0 (center). Hide the button. Show the 'Happy Hug Day' text and Signature with a delay.
7. Particles: Use a simple particle system (can be small motion.div hearts) that spawns on impact.
8. Audio: (Optional) If possible, add a subtle 'pop' sound effect.
9. Accessibility: Ensure the button has aria-label='Send virtual hug'.
10. Optimization: Keep the layout responsive. On mobile, stack them vertically if needed, but horizontal collision is cuter.
universal_guidelines: Ensure text contrast meets WCAG AA.
Use 'Great Vibes' ONLY for the signature and main celebratory heading.
Use 'Quicksand' for instructions and button text.
Add a subtle noise/grain texture to the background for a premium paper feel.
